subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Jason Pominville scored a short-handed goal 2 minutes 26 seconds into overtime, Ryan Miller made 34 saves and the Buffalo Sabres defeated the Ottawa Senators to advance to the Eastern Conference finals against the winner of the Carolina-Devils series.
